startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front. Feet together. Hands besides and slightly behind the buttocks. Lean back a little, using the arms to support the back. Spine Straight.

technique.instruction: Inhaling move both the feet backward, bending them from the ankle joint.
Exhaling move both the feet forward, bending them from the ankle joint. Try to touch the toes to the floor.

info: Move only the feet from the ankle joint, every other body part should be motionless.
Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
